fields.Purpose: Confirm and approve the evaluation committee's recommendation to award to the highest scoring proposers for the above referenced RFPs.
fields.Location: Saunders Library - small conference room - 1505 N Nebraska Ave. in Tampa
fields.Method: The awards review committee will meet in-person, all others who need live access to the meeting will be sent invitations to join the meeting. Provisions have been made for any member of the public desiring to have access to view the meeting.
fields.MeetingName: Awardss Review Committee for RFP 21315 and 21390
